name: Sarcopha-gon!
description:
This is a demo / playtest build for Sarcopha-gon!, a puzzle platformer game about falling blocks and clearing lines. 

Play as an evil mummy who was rightfully sealed away for millenia until a foolish archeologist disturbed his slumber. Guardians of the tomb try to contain you while you recover your preserved organs to gain supernatural abilites and clear them all!

This is an in-development game and I'm looking for as much feedback as I can get. Please fill out this form after playing regardless of how much you like the game: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1VMFxYi43g4Pr16MW-c6kvSKwvfEcXDvJqk1aNp4KSKY
